mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gathering_transaction (account_number, other_account_number, transaction_type_code, transaction_amount, balance_after_transaction, memo) values (#{accountNumber}, #{otherAccountNumber}, #{transactionTypeCode}, #{transactionAmount}, #{balanceAfterTransaction}, #{memo})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(transaction_time, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as transaction_time, transaction_type_code, transaction_category_code, memo, transaction_amount, balance_after_transaction FROM gathering_transaction WHERE account_number = #{accountNumber} ORDER BY transaction_time desc

SELECT transaction_category_code, transaction_amount FROM gathering_transaction WHERE account_number = #{accountNumber} AND transaction_category_code is not null AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM transaction_time) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM transaction_time) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)) ORDER BY transaction_time desc
